bib.title: Learning assistant-personalizing learning paths in e-Learning environments
bib.author: Kwasnicka, Halina and Szul, Dorota and Markowska-Kaczmar, Urszula and Myszkowski, Pawel B
bib.abstract: The paper presents an agent called Learning Assistant, which is responsible for defining individual learning paths for pupils in e-learning environment. The Assistant is able to infer using metadata described pupils and didactic materials; this inference is a basis for building the individual learning path for each pupil. To build a learning path for a new pupil the agent uses information collected during introductory tests. A SOM neural network is used for grouping similar pupils. WebTeacher is e-learning environment in which Learning Assistant
